mil4.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil4.4:1.1_0: “Kāṇasī walked around the Buddha by means of the tracket.
mil4.4:1.3_0: goes to an ende of the Buddha awakened for themselves; admit of fame by means of the opportunities; a awakened Buddha awakened for themselves; a lot of fame and disgracely; and a awakened for themselves; they walk for refuge to the Teaching and to the Sangha.
mil4.4:2.4_0: firm in the teaching and training.
mil4.4:3.1_0: These are the eight things recommended by the good,
mil4.4:3.3_0: Those who have lost their possessions,
